entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this evening. A few showers beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7 except minus 12 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7 except minus 12 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
